creator: Hako Idle Games
descriptionHtml:
Build and manage your own product factory in idle clicker crafting empire simulator game and become a gold digger and start investing money in various industries of resource production. Play one of the best idle games and try to become a crafting tycoon in this adventure clicker?
Just like in other empire building simulator games, you need to develop and upgrade your production by mining and crafting resources and earning gold. As in other clicker games, you can automate factories and earn gold even if you are offline!
Download for free and try increase your resource production!

In the best of the crafting and factory tycoon simulator, be the idle tycoon of your miner factory business and automate your workflow by hiring managers and miners, so that your products will sell automatically. Become a manager tycoon capitalist, build a millionaire empire, upgrade your workspace, and earn a massive profit. Gain some revenue and invest now in this idle clicker manager simulator!

Functions:
★ In this idle tycoon game you can upgrade the level of scientists who provide the study of new resources. Scientists keep working even when you are offline!
★ Build a factory and start producing the researched product. Upgrade your factory and get more crafting and more gold. As in other clicker games, you can use taps to speed up some processes. Tap on the factory icon and thereby speed up production!
★ As in other idle games have automation function: manager automates the process of building a factory and crafting resources, which will allow you to get more money.
★ Get closer to your goal - become a money tycoon, increase the level of prestige and earning more gold by crafting resources!
★ Get idle cash and earn money and gold. In this clicker simulator сrafting continues even the claw you are offline!
★ In this idle clicker simulator game most of the functions are available without an internet connection.
★ In-App purchases available.
★ The content in this adventure clicker tycoon simulator will last for hours!
★ You can get various bonuses by watching short videos, for example: increased profits from crafting and automatic sales.
★ Increase your money and gold and taps to riches in this offline adventure simulator!



As with other idle games, you have to start from scratch. Become a manager of a small production and develop it in this crafting simulator. Upgrade factories, automate sales and construction systems, increase your income and then you will definitely reach your goal: from a gold miner, you will become a real money tycoon.
Idle Crafting Tycoon is one of the clicker adventure games. You will definitely love this tycoon simulator.
Enjoyer free idle clicker, dedicated to the study and crafting of resources.
Build up your billionaire empire simulation without the endless clicking you experience in other clicker money and tycoon adventure games!

Our team loves to play Idle tycoon simulator games, but now we also love to create them for the players. We hope you enjoy our clicker empire building simulator crafting resources.
Go for adventure!
descriptionShort: Mine gold and become an crafting tycoon in this idle clicker simulator game

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Added new resources
Added additional bonuses
Improved game optimization
